Шедевр, так или иначе повлиявший на игровую индустрию. Игра, подарившая нам сиквел, в лице Half-life 2. Рекомендую всем, а если брезгуете графикой, к примеру, советую игру "Black Mesa". Это фанатский ремейк, сделанный на высшем уровне.
(Обратите внимание, РЕМЕЙК, а не ремастер)
Oyun güzel baya ama sonlara doğru çok sıkıyor.

The ultimate troll game.  I spent more time trying to hop on a box than I did beating the baddies.  It's still fun talking to the same 4 scientist faces scattered through-out the facility, and the support never does seem to follow you as you patiently line up your 78th crouch-jump manoeuvre to get through a gap for progression.  The neck-tie physics is well ahead of it's time, accurate physics and an independent tie model mean you stay 'in the zone' while that familiar scientist crumples to the ground and the tie flails exactly as you expect it to.
Highly recommended.

BUY NOW! I should have bought this earlier. Great game with amazing story!

This game was awesome. I really enjoyed everything about it. The enemies were very challenging, the maps are good, but I hate the map Interlope it proved to be one of the most difficult maps ever but still I was able to beat it. I had fun blasting enemies and the story was good. I'd definitely recommend everyone to play this game.
I don't know what to say but its pretty damn good.
Just buy it like you could run it on a potato.

This is my first FPS, and so I'm very bad at it. But it's a super charming and interesting game with a great world and some neat characters (like the G-Man). The alien enemies are really fun, but I can't stand the military enemies, they just flank and throw so many grenades I can't keep up. But I want to keep playing, the puzzles (while occasionally a little janky) are really fun to solve, and when the combat is good, it's really good. 
I'm also playing on easy, so I know that I really suck, but the game's great, I'm just bad at it.
It good me like, you play now.
This is only the half life. If you want the full life you gotta buy the DLC.
Игра для зажиточных, бичи страдают в блек месе.
this game is as all shooters should be

Что ещё тут написать, эта игра стала была прорывом в своё время, да и сейчас играется бодро. Запускается на любой современной ОС. Рекомендую все любителям качественных шутеров от первого лица. Но если хотите современной графики, купите полу-официальный ремейк под названием Black Mesa.

Классика sci-fi шутеров. Халву надо пройти хотя бы раз в жизни. Кстати, если кто не знает, знаменитый нынче Counter Strike появился в своё время как один из множества модов вот этой самой игры. Очень рекомендую.
Game came out in 1998 and is still better than these triple A games today. 9/10

Desde hace muchos años había escuchado que Half Life fue un juego que revolucionó la industria de los videojuegos y aportó mucho al género de los shooter, definitivamente así fue. El juego a pesar de que se estrenó en 1998 se sigue conservando bien, prácticamente funciona en cualquier equipo y es sumamente entretenido, ahora entiendo de donde videojuegos actuales como Halo o Gears of War tomaron su inspiración. El multijugador aunque sencillo y con pocos jugadores es muy divertido, definitivamente una compra de la que no te arrepentirás 10/10
A True Classic.  Enjoyed playing this again recently. Nostalgia
Who the fuck wouldn't recommend this game? Jesus.
